law.catch_line: Any person who in good faith makes or participates in making a report under Title 14, Subtitle 3 of ...
law.text: Any person who in good faith makes or participates in making a report under Title 14, Subtitle 3 of the Family Law Article or participates in an investigation or a judicial proceeding resulting from a report under Title 14, Subtitle 3 of the Family Law Article is immune from any civil liability that would otherwise result.
